title: Looking for a Support for a 5's team that lives in Melbourne area
body: We are a 5s team with players in the Melbourne area looking for new people to play with and also make a new friend in RL. We are all around the 20 year old age and study. need a support to finish off the team. we have silver - plat players on the team but we play for fun. rank isn't an issue

replies.body:
Hey! I'm a Gold 2 seasons 3/4 player that would be interested in playing some support if you are still looking! 
Add me in game, I'm online most of the time :)

I live in the area around Melbourne.  I'm high Silver ranked and play {{champion:53}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:37}} .  I'm a support main, in case that wasn't clear. :)
sweet. we are playing a heap of games tonight if you want to join. just add me and we can c whats what. :D
Probs won't be on a lot tonight, and won't be on tomorrow evening until at least 9pm because of an after-work thing.  Will definitely add you in-game though.
I live in Brisbane and I can support. Tho only: {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}}
Add me in game and we can play a few games later in the day
